name: Teez Agency
tagline: A Social Media Marketing Los Angeles
description:
Nestled in the heart of Los Angeles, Teez Agency provides high-quality content, service, and care for brands throughout the country. Teez founders, Noel and Waseem Ballou, have forged a partnership on the foundation of quality and trust that they extend to every client that walks through their doors.
Initially a startup founded in a one-bedroom apartment, Teez has since flourished into a constantly evolving social media agency, fully-stocked with passionate and skilled designers, chefs, videographers, and copywriters. Noel and Waseem attribute their exponential growth to the intense care they pour into every brand they work with. Unlike most PR firms who tack on social media to their services, Teez Agency solely specializes in social media, constantly learning, updating, and optimizing for your brandâ€™s benefit. Teez firmly believes that this is the future of marketing. In simpler words: Teez is not afraid to roll up its sleeves and get the job done.
